image.description: Information about the conainer to run in the deployment

command.description: The command does not need to be defined unless the container default needs changed.

name.description: The name used in the chart for the image.

tag.description: The image tag to use.  The chart will use .Chart.AppVersion but this can be overridden by defining the image.tag.

port.description: Set the container port to use. The chart will default to 8080 if not provided

replicas.description: The number of replicas, the chart default is 3 if not set.
